name: Alice is going to bed
description:
Alice is a little girl who's going to her room. All the lights in her house are turned off and she needs to face her fears to get there.

This little bullet hell game is a remake from the first game I ever made, for the #RemakeJam, with better level design and a nice soundtrack by myself. Enjoy! :3

Alice is going to bed by Guilherme Torres is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
Based on a work at https://github.com/torresguilherme/alice.
